name: Innovate Social Media
description:
Innovate Social Media is Digital Media Marketing, Media Consulting and Website Design Services. We create marketing best practices and great user experiences by managing and integrating social media with a marketing plan that marries total business development. Our agency specializes in digital media, data and technology.
We polish your business with a consumer recognizable social identity, congruent product branding, eye-catching video and graphics, intelligent content and action driven email communications. The results are telling KPI and analytics that drive your business to the next level. Your customers tell you what they need and you’re there at the ready, with a perfectly mirrored solution.  Experts in digital and social media strategy, we work hard with you to manage your media platforms and maintain and retain your valuable customer relationships by integrating social media with your CRM software. We leverage social media channels to find valuable and engaging industry specific content that drives traffic to your website. You stay top of mind with expert contact marketing via email. Innovate Social Media is a Constant Contact accredited solution provider.
